name: CPListImageRowItem
desc: A list template row that displays a series of images.

items.name: init(text: String, images: [UIImage])
items.desc: Creates a list item that displays a row of images.

items.name: var gridImages: [UIImage]
items.desc: The images that appear in the list item’s image row.

items.name: func update([UIImage])
items.desc: Adds, removes, reorders, or updates the images in the list item’s image row.

items.name: class var maximumImageSize: CGSize
items.desc: The maximum size of an image that an image row can display.

items.name: let CPMaximumNumberOfGridImages: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of images that an image row can contain.

items.name: var listImageRowHandler: ((CPListImageRowItem, Int, () -> Void) -> Void)?
items.desc: An optional closure that CarPlay invokes when the user selects an image.

items.name: var handler: ((CPSelectableListItem, () -> Void) -> Void)?
items.desc: An optional closure that CarPlay invokes when the user selects the list item.

items.name: var userInfo: Any?
items.desc: An opaque value for the list item.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the item is enabled.
